description: Delta and dictionary flags set per fixture expectations
Invalid magic bytes rejected at reader initialization
String length limit enforced before allocation
Corrupted block header detected during iteration
Future file version rejected during header decode
Corrupted file header rejected before block decode
Invalid NDJSON input rejected with `Json` error
Decompression propagates sink I/O failures as `Io`
Missing input path surfaces `Io` during compression
CLI `cat` surfaces available fields when request is invalid
CLI rejects unsupported `pack` flags with helpful diagnostic
Numbers MUST round-trip as exact numeric values
Absent vs Null MUST be preserved
Decoders MUST support at least id=0 (none) and id=1 (zstd)
Segment payload MUST appear in specified order
Values exceeding 64-bit integer MUST be encoded as decimal
Dictionary index out of range MUST trigger error
Unknown magic or major version MUST trigger UnsupportedVersion
Conformance test MUST verify full round-trip equality
Conformance test MUST verify projection user yields expected sequence
ULEB128 decode MUST cap at 10 bytes for u64
Decoders MUST reject leading zeros unless value is zero
Unused high bits in final tag byte MUST be zero
Unknown type tags MUST fail with UnsupportedFeature
Unknown compressor IDs MUST fail with UnsupportedCompression
Writers MUST only emit complete blocks
EOF before block complete MUST return UnexpectedEof
Dictionary entry count MUST NOT exceed max_dict_entries_per_field
Each dictionary entry length MUST NOT exceed max_string_len_per_value
